vista.set
Class Session

java.lang.Object
  vista.set.Session
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, GroupManager, Named
Direct Known Subclasses:
SessionProxy, SessionProxyState
public class Session
extends java.lang.Object
implements GroupManager, java.io.Serializable

A session is an aggregate of groups.

See Also:
Serialized Form

          creates an empty session with a blank name

          creates a session with a name and list of groups

createUnion

public Session createUnion(Session s)
Creates a union of this session with given session. This is basically combining the group(s) in both sessions in one session and returning it.

sortBy

public void sortBy(java.util.Comparator<Group> comparator)
Sorts session by calling upon the SortAlgorithm to return an array of groups by some criteria. The group list is being directly manipulated by the sorting mechanism.

save

public void save()
saves session to its file

saveTo

public void saveTo(java.lang.String filename)
saves to filename ands sets the filename for this session. All further saves will be to that file if filename is not specified.
